typeuses.Pandaros.Settlers.BronzeSword: For taking care of small problems.
typeuses.Pandaros.Settlers.PatrolFlag: Used with the Patrol Tool. Tells your knights where to keep watch!
typeuses.Pandaros.Settlers.PatrolTool: Left Click to set patrol points, Right click to create patrol. Left click on existing patrols to change patrol type.
typeuses.Pandaros.Settlers.Miner: A good machine can mine twice as fast as any human! Requires a good supply or wood or coal. Crank to start!
typeuses.Pandaros.Settlers.MachinistBench: Machinist's need this bench to repair machines on. The Machinist monitors all machies within 20 blocks of the bench.
typeuses.Pandaros.Settlers.StoneTurret: 50 Damage per shot. Fires twice as fast as a Colonist.
typeuses.Pandaros.Settlers.BronzeArrowTurret: 100 Damage per shot. Fires twice as fast as a Colonist.
typeuses.Pandaros.Settlers.CrossbowTurret: 300 Damage per shot. Fires twice as fast as a Colonist.
typeuses.Pandaros.Settlers.MatchlockTurret: 500 Damage per shot. Fires twice as fast as a Colonist.

Machines1.description: Allows crafting of machines for crafters. Adds the machinist job.

ImprovedDurability1.name: Improved Durability I
ImprovedDurability1.description: Increases all machines durability by 10%. Machines will need repairing less often.

ImprovedDurability2.name: Improved Durability II
ImprovedDurability2.description: Increases all machines durability by 20%. Machines will need repairing less often.

ImprovedDurability3.name: Improved Durability III
ImprovedDurability3.description: Increases all machines durability by 30%. Machines will need repairing less often.

ImprovedDurability4.name: Improved Durability IV
ImprovedDurability4.description: Increases all machines durability by 40%. Machines will need repairing less often.

ImprovedDurability5.name: Improved Durability V
ImprovedDurability5.description: Increases all machines durability by 50%. Machines will need repairing less often.

ImprovedFuelCapacity1.name: Improved Fuel Capacity I
